name: Rocket Run!
description:
The first version of a university project, Rocket Run!

In order to dodge the rockets that are comming, you have a handy jetpack to fly around, yet it is malfunctioning. Keep pressing it to get bursts of heigth to get pass the danger! Be careful to not touch the fire as well!

Avaliable in 550x900 and 450x700.

All the art and programming was made by me. Consider geting me a kofi if you enjoyed the game!

Music made by pixelsphere.org / The Cynic Project

Sound effects made by Michael Kurinnoy

Any bugs found, please let me know!
